comment: ... hundreds of Iranian protesters . He was already attacking our Embassy , and preparing for additional hits in other locations . Iran has been nothing but problems for many years . Let this serve as a WARNING that if Iran strikes any Americans , or American assets , we have ...
amr:
# ::snt ... hundreds of Iranian protesters . He was already attacking our Embassy , and preparing for additional hits in other locations . Iran has been nothing but problems for many years . Let this serve as a WARNING that if Iran strikes any Americans , or American assets , we have ...
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (p / person
            :ARG0-of (p2 / protest-01)
            :quant (m2 / multiple
                  :op1 100)
            :mod (c / country
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "Iran")))
      :snt2 (a / and
            :op1 (a2 / attack-01
                  :ARG0 (h / he)
                  :ARG1 (e / embassy
                        :poss (w / we))
                  :time (a3 / already))
            :op2 (p3 / prepare-02
                  :ARG0 h
                  :ARG1 (h2 / hit-01
                        :ARG0 h
                        :location (l / location
                              :mod (o / other))
                        :mod (a4 / additional))))
      :snt3 (p4 / problem
            :domain (c2 / country
                  :name (n2 / name
                        :op1 "Iran"))
            :mod (n3 / nothing-but)
            :duration (m3 / many
                  :op1 (t / temporal-quantity
                        :quant 1
                        :unit (y / year))))
      :snt4 (l2 / let-01
            :mode imperative
            :ARG0 (y2 / you)
            :ARG1 (s / serve-01
                  :ARG0 (t2 / this)
                  :ARG1 (w2 / warn-01
                        :ARG1 (h3 / have-condition-91
                              :ARG1 (h4 / have-03
                                    :ARG0 (c3 / country
                                          :name (n4 / name
                                                :op1 "Iran")))
                              :ARG2 (s2 / strike-01
                                    :ARG0 c3
                                    :ARG1 (o2 / or
                                          :op1 (p5 / person
                                                :mod (c4 / country
                                                      :name (n5 / name
                                                            :op1 "America"))
                                                :mod (a5 / any))
                                          :op2 (a6 / asset
                                                :mod c4))))))))

comment: ... targeted Iranian sites ( representing the American hostages taken by Iran many years ago ) , some at a very high level & important to Iran & the Iranian culture , and those targets , and Iran itself , WILL BE HIT VERY FAST AND VERY HARD . The USA wants no more threats !
amr:
# ::snt ... targeted Iranian sites ( representing the American hostages taken by Iran many years ago ) , some at a very high level & important to Iran & the Iranian culture , and those targets , and Iran itself , WILL BE HIT VERY FAST AND VERY HARD . The USA wants no more threats !
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (a / and
            :op1 (t / target-01
                  :ARG1 (s / site
                        :mod (c / country
                              :name (n / name
                                    :op1 "Iran"))
                        :ARG0-of (r / represent-01
                              :ARG1 (h / hostage
                                    :mod (c2 / country
                                          :name (n2 / name
                                                :op1 "United"
                                                :op2 "States"))
                                    :ARG1-of (t2 / take-01
                                          :ARG0 c
                                          :time (b / before
                                                :op1 (n3 / now)
                                                :quant (m2 / many
                                                      :op1 (t3 / temporal-quantity
                                                            :quant 1
                                                            :unit (y / year)))))
                                    :quant (s2 / some)
                                    :ARG1-of (h2 / high-02
                                          :degree (v / very))
                                    :ARG1-of (ii / important-01
                                          :ARG2 (a2 / and
                                                :op1 c
                                                :op2 (c3 / culture
                                                      :mod c)))))))
            :op2 (h3 / hit-01
                  :ARG1 (a3 / and
                        :op1 s
                        :op2 c)
                  :manner (a4 / and
                        :op1 (f / fault-01
                              :degree (v2 / very))
                        :op2 (h4 / hard-02
                              :degree v2))))
      :snt2 (w / want-01
            :polarity -
            :ARG0 (c4 / country
                  :name (n4 / name
                        :op1 "USA"))
            :ARG1 (t4 / threaten-01
                  :quant (m3 / more))))
